div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 749 Plovdiv (anc. Philippopolis), Bulgaria, 1941 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 84 AR. Pot hoard Thracian Chersonese: 77 hemidr. Apollonia Pontica: 1 diob.? Parium: 6 hemidr. Disposition: dispersed Gerasimov, BIAB 15 (1946), p. 237
